profile.coverLetter:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing to express my interest in opportunities where I can contribute as a Senior Full-Stack Engineer. With over 8 years of experience delivering scalable SaaS, FinTech, and GovTech solutions, I bring deep technical expertise, proven problem-solving skills, and a strong record of driving measurable business impact.

In my current role at Termgrid, I designed and scaled a debt management platform handling over 1M records, improved performance by 30%, and reduced deployment times by 40% through automated CI/CD pipelines. Previously at Deloitte, I built real-time enterprise dashboards, cut page load times by 50%, and led a team of developers, fostering collaboration and code quality. My experience at Cognizant and NIC further strengthened my skills in building secure, high-performance systems and reducing infrastructure costs through serverless architectures.

Some of my key strengths include:
	‚Ä¢	Expertise in React, Next.js, Node.js, NestJS, and AWS for building modern, scalable applications.
	‚Ä¢	Proven ability to optimize cloud costs (up to 50%) and improve CI/CD pipelines.
	‚Ä¢	Experience delivering cross-platform solutions with React Native and event-driven systems.
	‚Ä¢	Strong collaboration and mentorship skills, working effectively across distributed, multicultural teams.

I am particularly drawn to roles that emphasize scalability, performance, and innovation, where I can leverage my skills in AI/LLM integration, DevOps automation, and cloud-native practices to help organizations grow.

I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my background and expertise align with your company‚Äôs needs. Thank you for considering my application, and I look forward to the possibility of contributing to your team.

Sincerely,
Manish Gandotra

I am looking for change because my contract is going to expire with my current company and looking for some good opportunities

Senior Full-Stack Engineer with 8+ years of experience delivering high-performance SaaS, FinTech, and GovTech platforms. Proven ability to scale applications to millions of records, cut cloud costs by 50%, and improve CI/CD delivery by 40%. Experienced in React, Node.js, AWS, DevOps, and AI/LLM integration. Skilled at collaborating in multinational teams and driving business impact.

‚Ä¢ Scaled SaaS platforms to 1M+ records with low-latency performance. ‚Ä¢ Cut AWS costs by 50% via serverless design and optimized cloud usage. ‚Ä¢ Accelerated deployments by 40% with Jenkins + Docker pipelines. ‚Ä¢ Delivered enterprise dashboards for multinational clients, improving data visibility and decision-making. ‚Ä¢ Enhanced security & reduced support load by 40% with distributed systems and RBAC.
Senior Full-Stack Engineer | SaaS | FinTech | Cloud | AI
